general.allow: Allows the general spawning of pebbles.
general.shoot: Set the shoot speed of the pebbles.
general.dropchance: sets the drop chance to balanced or unbalanced (if unbalanced stone and netherrack -pebbles has the highest drop chance)

block.allow: Sets the block where pebbles can spawn.

dimension.allow spawn over zero: Allows the spawning of deepslate pebbles and dripstone pebbles over 0.
dimension.surface: Allows the spawning of basalt, blackstone and netherrack -pebbles on surface.
dimension.nether: Allows the spawning of stone, andesite, diorite, granite -pebbles and sticks in the nether.

stone.allow: Allows the spawning of stone pebbles.

andesite.allow: Allows the spawning of andesite pebbles.

diorite.allow: Allows the spawning of diorite pebbles.

granite.allow: Allows the spawning of granite pebbles.

basalt.allow: Allows the spawning of basalt pebbles.

blackstone.allow: Allows the spawning of blackstone pebbles.

calcite.allow: Allows the spawning of calcite pebbles.

dripstone.allow: Allows the spawning of dripstone pebbles.

netherrack.allow: Allows the spawning of netherrack pebbles.

tuff.allow: Allows the spawning of tuff pebbles.

deepslate.allow: Allows the spawning of deepslate pebbles.
